entry.title: Finally online
entry.content:
It’s done!

After many years of thinking about setting up my own web-page I finally sat down and produced this page using jekyll, a static website generator. My page is vaguely based on a scholarly template named DrJekyll which employs Jekyll-Scholar plugin for nicely managing my publications page directly from a BibTeX file.

I already added a small section about who I am, a detailed description of my research interests will follow soon. In my blog I will from time to time write down some exciting scientific observations, useful code snippets or other stuff that might be worth sharing. So hope you and I stay tuned for the next updates!
